patthana21.6:4.1: Naāsavaṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā noāsavo kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.6:5.1: Naāsavaṃ naakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā āsavo akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.6:6.1: Naāsavaṃ naabyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca noāsavo abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.6:6.2: Nanoāsavaṃ naabyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca noāsavo abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.6:6.5: Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi … pe … avigate tīṇi.
